nodes.text: The Armageddon Battalion post was a military installation of the Sith Empire on Hoth during the Galactic War. Armageddon Battalion was quartered there until it was persuaded by the Emperor's Wrath to depart and join the Battle of Corellia.
The Armageddon Battalion post appears as an area on Hoth in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
